item.description:
TO ORDER YOUR TICKET AT THE GROUP RATE ($20 per ticket):
Call Carol Dempsey
Phone: 781.279.7885 x105
Email: groups@stonehamtheatre.org

The tickets will be under the group name "Culture Vultures." I just spoke to Carol and she is super nice and very excited about our group coming to the performance. Tickets will be held at the "Will Call" window the night of the performance.

EVERYONE IS RESPONSIBLE FOR ORDERING HIS/HER OWN TICKET(S)


This is a chance to see some good live theater at a very reasonable price! Even if you didn't RSVP before, you can do it now and call and order a ticket!

Let's chase away the winter blahs with an evening at the theater! We have enough people to get a special group rate!


Sunfish
music by Hyeyoung Kim
lyrics by Michael Cooper
book by Michael Cooper and Hyeyoung Kim
musical direction by John Howrey
directed by Caitlin Lowans

When offered a miraculous cure to restore her father's sight, a poor young girl sacrifices everything she knows and is swept up in an adventure that takes her from her small village to a fantastic undersea world. Based on a traditional Korean folk-tale, Sunfish combines the energy of Wicked with the magic of The Little Mermaid.

More here (including some music samples) - http://stonehamtheatr...
item.how_to_find_us: A meeting point will be emailed before the show
item.name: "Sunfish" at the Stoneham Theater!
